article: president george w. bush 's personal letter to north korean leader kim jong il , raising the possibility of normalized relations if he fully discloses his nuclear programs by year 's end , is a turnabout for a president who has labeled the communist regime part of an `` axis of evil .
abstract: bush sends letter to north korean dictator other leaders in #-party nuclear talks
